Henderson.Skyline Casino: Skyline Hotel and Casino is a locals casino and hotel located on 0.89 acres (0.36 ha) of land at 1741 North Boulder Highway in Henderson, Nevada. The property initially opened as the Dixie Bar in the 1940s. The Skyline opened as a casino on the property on October 1, 1964, but closed the following year. The Skyline reopened on October 1, 1974, and has been renovated numerous times since then, with a 51-room hotel structure opening in June 2017.
